title: James Franco accusers detail misconduct allegations on ‘GMA’

meta_data.description: Two women who have accused actor James Franco of sexual misconduct said on ABC’s “Good Morning America” on Tuesday that they’re waiting for him to make amends. Violet Paley and Sarah Tither-Kaplan repeated accusations they’ve made on Twitter that Franco abused his power and behaved inappropriately. Paley has accused Franco of coercing her into performing […]
